Name: Regnum Carya
Description: This resort boasts a magnificent setting close to Belek. The resort is set on a sprawling sandy beach, just a short distance away from a myriad of attractions. The complex is serviced by public transport links, as well as a taxi rank, offering ease of access to other areas to be discovered and explored. This spectacular resort is sure to surpass all expectations. The guest rooms are luxuriously appointed, exuding classical elegance and sophistication. Guests can enjoy a round of golf on the resort's course, which was designed by Peter Thomson. An extensive choice of first-class facilities and services are available for guests' use. Guests are assured of a truly unrivalled experience, rich in comfort and convenience, at this sublime hotel.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks top brands
